item.title: Timeout Commands in Go
item.description: Sometimes in our applications, we need to invoke external processes or commands (e.g CURL, Ping, SSH etc.) to perform some tasks. We can use os/exec Go package to invoke external processes. Most of the time we want to invoke these commands with timeouts.Â In this blog post, I am going to talk about the different ways in which we can invoke a command with a timeout. Timeout with timer In this method, we will use a timer for the timeout.
